text_block_list.text: The first race of the fall season… The Kyōto Daishōten was won by Mejiro McQueen in marvellous fashion.
Due to her steady growth, the public's fondness of her only grew.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Amazing! This book, that book, all of these books have McQueen on them!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I did not think I would get to this level of fame…

text_block_list.name: Little Boy
text_block_list.text: Ah! It's Mejo MaKeen! Please shake my hand!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course I will. Also, it is pronounced Mejiro McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Even young kids know of you. Ain't that right, Miss Star Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Jeez… Please stop teasing me.

text_block_list.name: Little Boy
text_block_list.text: I'll be rooting for you in the next race, Mejo MaKeen! I believe in you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. I will be sure to win. Also, it is pronounced Mejiro McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Little Boy
text_block_list.text: Okay, bye bye!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Goodbye.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: My reputation has gotten quite larger than I had realized…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: What is it? The fame starting to make you nervous?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Th-That's definitely not the case! As a member of the Mejiro Family I am simply full of pride!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hmm… I think it's fine to be a little nervous though, ya know?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Jeez, please stop saying such irrelevant things.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Good morning everyone.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san, listen to this! The amount of Uma Musume that want to be transferred here is increasing!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It has been like that since the Kyōto Daishōten, hasn't it.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: That's all thanks to your amazing work, McQueen-chan.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: If you manage to win the upcoming Fall Tenno Sho you'll be the second Uma Musume ever to win both the Spring and Fall Tenno Sho!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: The number of members is just going to increase after that!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Jeez… That is as long as I win.
They can't help but be excited right now. After all, you have so much momentum/you're on a roll.
They can't help but be excited right now. After all, you have so much momentum/you're on a roll.
We're starting to get as much attention as Sensei did when he ran the team.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: We're going to become a powerhouse team once again!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I'll be cheering you on from the front row!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I get it, everyone. I will be sure to win the next race as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now then, let's begin our training for today.
“I will be sure to win” is what she said, and that determination was clearly evident in today's mock race.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woaah! She's so fast!
Goal! What an amazing victory. Even your finish was perfect!
Goal! What an amazing victory. Even your finish was perfect!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haa… Haa… Whoo…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: During the Takarazuka Kinen I was unable to get into a good position so I had to take the corners at a wide angle. It was quite difficult.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I need to stay conscious of when to dash and proper positioning so that I can comfortably finish these races.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ho ho ho… It seems as though you are nearly prepared to face me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Before you and I can race one another you need to pass your gate test.
Well that's it for today. Everyone, make sure to apply ice to your legs.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Umm, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I am still full of energy, so I would like to go for one more lap.

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ah, if that's the case I want to do one more lap too!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: Me too! If McQueen-chan is giving her all I've got to do so as well!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eh? You don't have to force yourself to do what I am…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: It's fine, don't worry about us! After all, we love watching the way you run.
choice_data_list: Everyone, just make sure to pace yourselves.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Jeez… Well, we will be back.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woaah! She's all fired up! Welp, guess I've gotta get in her way.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hey!! Stop trying to grab my tail!
Mejiro McQueen's success has had a positive impact on the rest of the team members.
She is, without a doubt, the heart of this team.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san!
Tazuna-san, what's the matter?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: I have something to discuss with you regarding McQueen-san…
